title: Rebrand extension manifest for Fastronome publisher
description: Update vss-extension.json publisher, extension id, display name, and repository links to the Fastronome fork while preserving task contribution identifiers for pipeline compatibility and keeping MIT license metadata intact.
close_reason: Updated vss-extension.json publisher, extension id/display name, and repository metadata for Fastronome while leaving task contribution identifiers unchanged

title: Enable public Marketplace publishing
description: Set vss-extension.json public flag to true so the extension can be published publicly in the Azure DevOps Marketplace.
close_reason: Set vss-extension.json public flag to true for public Marketplace publishing

title: Rename dev taskfile to default Taskfile
description: Rename taskfile.dev.yml to the default Taskfile.yml so task can run without the -t flag.
close_reason: Renamed taskfile.dev.yml to Taskfile.yml so task discovers publish task without -t

title: Update docs and release metadata for OpenAI auth
description: Update README and release versions to document OpenAI API auth instead of Azure deployment auth, and bump versions for republish.
close_reason: Updated README and metadata for OpenAI API auth and bumped versions to 1.0.25 for republish

title: Ignore local JetBrains IDE files
description: Add .idea/ and *.iml entries to the repository .gitignore so local IntelliJ/JetBrains project files do not appear in git status.
close_reason: Added .idea/ and *.iml patterns to .gitignore to suppress local JetBrains IDE files

title: Fix publish blockers (version bump and task build)
description: Resolve tfx publish failure by increasing extension version and ensuring ai-code-review/dist/main.js is built before publishing. Update Taskfile publish workflow accordingly.

title: Migrate task auth from Azure OpenAI to OpenAI API
description: Replace Azure OpenAI deployment auth in ai-code-review runtime and task schema with standard OpenAI API key + model auth (upstream-style), keeping existing review features.
close_reason: Replaced Azure deployment auth with OpenAI API key + model inputs in runtime and task schema, and validated TypeScript build

title: Add env files for publish task
description: Create .env and .env.example for TFX_PAT, ignore .env in git, and update Taskfile.yml publish task to load variables from .env automatically.
close_reason: Added .env/.env.example for TFX_PAT, ignored .env, and configured Taskfile publish task to load .env via dotenv

title: Rebrand README for Fastronome fork
description: Update README ownership/publisher messaging for the MIT-licensed Fastronome fork. Add clear attribution to original lineage, credit Alexey Samoylov, remove original donation links, and switch marketplace/repo/issue links to the Fastronome fork and new publisher/extension identity.
close_reason: Updated README for Fastronome publisher branding, MIT fork attribution, and Fastronome marketplace/repo/issue links; removed original donation links

title: Normalize OpenAI input names to camelCase
description: Rename newly added OpenAI task inputs from snake_case to camelCase to match existing task input naming conventions, and update runtime/docs references.
close_reason: Renamed OpenAI auth inputs to camelCase (apiKey/aiModel) in task schema, runtime, and README example

title: Support globs and extensions for include/exclude filters
description: Allow fileExtensions and fileExcludes to accept both extension tokens (e.g. .go, .gen.go) and glob patterns (e.g. **/*.go, **/*.gen.go) while preserving existing behavior.
close_reason: Added shared include/exclude matcher supporting extension tokens and glob patterns for fileExtensions and fileExcludes; verified .go and **/*.gen.go matching

title: Support glob patterns in fileExcludes
description: Update repository file exclusion filtering so fileExcludes supports path glob patterns like **/*.gen.go while preserving exact filename exclusion behavior.
close_reason: Added glob pattern support to fileExcludes and verified **/*.gen.go matches generated Go files across nested paths

title: Add Taskfile publish task for tfx
description: Add a development Taskfile with a publish task that runs tfx extension publish for vss-extension.json using a PAT environment variable.
close_reason: Added taskfile.dev.yml with publish task using TFX_PAT and tfx extension publish for vss-extension.json

title: Make Azure Pipelines task GUID unique for public publish
description: Replace the upstream task GUID in ai-code-review/task.json with a new unique GUID to satisfy Marketplace validation, then bump extension/task/package versions for republish.
close_reason: Replaced Azure Pipelines task GUID with a unique GUID and bumped versions to 1.0.24 for Marketplace republish

title: Bump release version
description: Increment extension, task, and package versions for the next publish attempt.
close_reason: Bumped extension, task, and package versions from 1.0.25 to 1.0.26 for next publish

title: Upgrade task runners to Node20_1
description: Remove Node10 from ai-code-review/task.json execution, add Node20_1, keep Node16 to eliminate the tfx end-of-life runner warning during publish. Bump extension/task/package versions for republish.
close_reason: Updated task runners to Node16+Node20_1, removed Node10, and bumped versions to 1.0.23 for republish

title: Document include/exclude glob and extension filters
description: Update README and task input help text to document that fileExtensions and fileExcludes support comma-separated extensions, globs, and exact filenames.
close_reason: Documented mixed extension/glob support for fileExtensions and fileExcludes in README and task input help text
